屳字的基本解释

屳
xiān
古同“仙”。

屳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiān］
［《集韻》相然切，平，心。］
(1)同“仙”。
(2)地名用字。江西省南康县有上古屳。

屳字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　屳； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页307第04
【集韻】相然切，音鮮。山居長往也。【字彙】卽仙字。入山長生曰仙。○按與人部仚字音義不同。《正字通》譌合爲一，反駁《字彙》之非，不知其本有兩字也。

屳字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
屳字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
屳
xiān
Ancient Tong "Xian".
屳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiān］
["Ji Yun" is cut, flat, heart. ]
(1) Same as "Xian".
(2) Words used in place names. There are antiquity in Nankang County, Jiangxi Province.
屳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　屳; Kangxi Strokes: 5; Page Number: Page 307 04
【Jiyun】The sound is fresh and cut. Mountain dwelling is also long gone. 【Vocabulary】卽仙字. Entering the mountain for long life is called immortal. ○The pronunciation and meaning are different from those of Renbu. "Zhengzitong" and "Zhao" are combined into one, which refutes the wrong of "Zihui". I don't know that there are two characters in it.
